Part of the #fungi trail loop that explores Black Wood is very boggy now so I've tweaked the trail so it just heads to Hail's View and back now in the Black Wood section. 
If you've been enjoying the trail we'd love to see your photos and hear your comments 😍🍄
(2/2)

Just been out for a final update of the #fungi trail before it officially finishes tomorrow. Although slightly battered by wind and rain there is still plenty to see so I might just keep it going for a few more days. Today's selection: bitter oysterling & blusher.
(1/2) https://t.co/iw442VfEGV

Please be mindful of other people’s space, particularly indoors and on narrow sections of our paths. Please #RespectProtectEnjoy the special wildlife here and each other – keeping to the paths, following signage on site and directions from our friendly team.
(5/5)

We’re delighted to have you back and want you to have an enjoyable and comfortable experience here: In line with Government recommendations, we ask that all visitors, unless exempt, please continue to wear a face covering in our indoor spaces including hides.
(4/5)

Our annual fungi trail is up and running throughout October on the wooded heathland trail and we have spooky activities lined up for our #BigWildHalloween. Find out about our events and activities here:https://t.co/lgXcHgrnzL
(3/5)

Open daily 10 am – 4 pm 
✅Outdoor, staffed Welcome Point  
✅Toilets  
✅Café - take away and outdoor tea terrace. Limited indoor seating is available from Mon 26 July.  
✅Shop with all your nature-needs.  
Card payments are preferred.
(2/5)

Welcome back! We’re excited to have many of our facilities OPEN for your visit! Here’s a summary of what’s available:
Open daily, dawn til dusk:  
✅Car park  
✅Nature reserve trails  
✅Hides - all 4 of our hides are now open
(1/5) https://t.co/6KRR3bUwso

We're getting ready for a #BigWildHalloween; pick up an activity pack, follow the Spellbinding Spiders trail and make a mud monster. Daily from Sat 23 October - Sun 31 October. Find out more about all our upcoming events and activities here:
https://t.co/lgXcHgrnzL https://t.co/GVnSAwLDlS

@CloughBarry Glad you enjoyed the #fungi trail Barry. I'm hoping for a little (but not too much) rain just to liven things up again...

It's not just the birds who enjoy our  tasty @Natures_Voice bird food. This cute bank vole is a regular in Fattengates courtyard where we scatter seed.
Our shop is open from 10am - 4 pm daily and stocks a wide range of bird food and feeders.
Photo: Phil Thornton https://t.co/AIZuYU7AV3

The first redwing of the autumn are arriving at the reserve. Like it's  relative the song thrush the redwing has speckles on its chest, but look for the creamy strip above the eye and rusty-red underwings. Listen for their 'seep' calls as flocks fly overhead.
Photo: Gareth Hughes https://t.co/16nod5sR7x

Cafe closed today (Mon 20 Sep) and tomorrow (Tues 21 Sep) for staff training.

👉Se rotan las barricas y se realiza pigeage en forma manual diariamente.

👉Posteriormente se procede a una maceración en frío a 8° C durante 20 días, procedimiento que permite obtener mayores componentes aromáticos de manera suave, debido a que en este momento el alcohol no forma parte de la solubilización de sustancias.

Microvinificación #GrandCuvee. 🍷
👉Se realiza un desgranado a mano de cada racimo de Malbec y Cabernet Franc, luego toda la uva es colocada en barricas de roble francés para una fermentación conjunta de los varietales (co-fermentación). https://t.co/jz7EBwapKv
